thread.title: BRIEF-Baker Hughes A GE Co Board Elects Lorenzo Simonelli As Chairman

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baker Hughes A GE Co Board Elects Lorenzo Simonelli As Chairman
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Baker Hughes A GE Co:
* SAYS ON MAY 11, 2018, BOARD OF DIRECTORS ELECTED LORENZO SIMONELLI AS CHAIRMAN OF BOARD - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2rFURBN ) Further company coverage:
